title: FS: T206 Moose Grimshaw - Carolina BRIGHTS - SGG 1

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Moose Grimshaw - Carolina BRIGHTS - SGG 1
posts.post_content:
Minor corner wear, obviously two spots of missing paper on front. Portrait is nice, no other major blemishes. No creases. Back has some bottom staining, but the logo comes in nice.

Sorry for the bad scan. If you email me, I can try to send some via my phone.

$550 shipped

Pay Pal NOT ACCEPTED! Only checks and money orders
